text: Ke kaloku Sele niwufumene owona mzekelo mhle kuIbrâhîm nabo babekunye naye, xa bathi kubantu bakubo, “Inene thina siyazahlulakuninakuloontoniyinqulayongaphandlekoAllâh. Siyaniphika, kananjalo sele kuvele ubutshaba nenzondwano phakathi kwethu nani ngonaphakade de nikholwe kuAllâh Yedwa,” ngaphandle nje kokuba uIbrâhîm waye wathi kuyise “Mna ndiya kukucelela itarhu inene, kodwa (andinagunya) lokukwenzela nantoni na ngokuchasene noAllâh: Nkosi yethu kukuWe apho sixhomekekileyo, kukuWe nalapho sibuyela khona kananjalo Wena Usisiphelo sohambo (lwethu)
